post:
TNAHosting is happy to offer the LET community the following dedicated server promotions. We’ve been in business since 2012, providing a variety of reliable and cost-effective services.

--Dedicated Servers--
- SynergyCP Control Panel
- Automated OS Installs
- IP KVM
- Remote Reboot
- DDoS Protection 
- Located in Chicago, IL


E3-1271v3 Dedicated Server
* E3-1271v3 - 4 Cores / 8 Threads @ 3.6GHz / 4GHz Turbo
* 16GB DDR3
* 500GB HDD (SSD & HDD Upgrades Available) 
* 20TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps OR 100Mbps Unmetered
* /29 IPv4 (IPv6 Available)
* $34/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=88&promocode=1271V3-34 "Order Here") [Promocode: 1271V3-34]


Dual X5560 Dedicated Server
* Dual X5560 - 8 Cores / 16 Threads @ 2.8GHz / 3.2GHz Turbo
* 16GB DDR3
* 2x 2TB HDD
* 20TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps OR 100Mbps Unmetered
* /29 IPv4 (IPv6 Available)
* $29/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=86&promocode=X5560-YHF "Order Here") [Promocode: X5560-YHF]


E3-1230v2 Dedicated Server
* E3-1230v2 - 4 Cores / 8 Threads @ 3.3GHz / 3.7GHz Turbo
* 16GB DDR3
* 1TB HDD
* 20TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps OR 100Mbps Unmetered
* /29 IPv4 (IPv6 Available)
* $24/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=72&promocode=1230V2-YJRTHDBG "Order Here") [Promocode: 1230V2-YJRTHDBG]



Dedicated servers will be setup within 1-3 business days.

Chicago Looking Glass: [http://lg.chi2.tnahosting.net/](http://lg.chi2.tnahosting.net/ "http://lg.chi2.tnahosting.net/")

We accept PayPal, Major Credit/Debit Cards (Stripe), and Bitcoin.

Have questions or need something custom? Feel free to PM me or [open a sales ticket](https://tnahosting.net/billing/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2 "open a sales ticket").
